name: Vaccinator
description:
My entry for Ludum Dare 46! Pilot the fantastic ship Vaccinator with total freedom as you blast away incoming viruses! Medication periodically comes in (both orally and suppository) to completely heal all organs! Remember, you can live with only one kidney and one lung!

Non-QWERTY support coming soon.

CONTROLS

WASD - Move

E, Q - Move up and down

Mouse - Control pitch and yaw

Z, C - Control roll

Left Mouse Button - Shoot
